I am a researcher at Charles University in Prague, Czech Republic, with the main focus on quantitative ecology, macroecology, palaeoecology, and community ecology with interest in data science.


PhD in Entomology | 11/2019
University of South Bohemia | ƒåesk√© Budƒõjovice, Czech Republic
Thesis awarded by dean‚Äôs prize entitled ‚ÄúSpatial structure and community dynamics of arboreal ants in a tropical rainforest‚Äù

MSc in Zoology | 6/2015
University of South Bohemia | ƒåesk√© Budƒõjovice, Czech Republic
Thesis awarded dean‚Äôs price entitled ‚ÄúStructure and dynamics of arboreal ant communities along successional gradient in a mountain tropical forest of New Guinea‚Äù

BSc in Biology | 6/2013
University of South Bohemia | ƒåesk√© Budƒõjovice, Czech Republic
Thesis entitled ‚ÄúDetection of UV-fluorescent-marked prey in the guts of predators and scavengers, dynamics of scavenging in a model experiment‚Äù



6/2023 - present
Center for Theoretical Sciences, Charles University, Prague, Czech Republic
Awardet a personal GACR grand for my BIODYNAMICS project.

9/2022 - 6/2023
Parental leave

2/2020 - 6/2022
Department of Biological Sciences, University of Bergen, Norway
Postdoc at ERC project (PI: Prof.¬†H.J.B. Birks) entitled ‚ÄúHumans on planet Earth (HOPE)‚Äù

2019 (6 weeks)
Nditam, Cameroon, Africa
Leading field sampling of arboreal ants on an ERC project (PI: Prof.¬†V. Novotny) entitled ‚ÄúEcological determinants of tropical-temperate trends in insect diversity‚Äù

2017 - 2019 (6 weeks)
Brussels, Belgium
Main data analytics at Mobility Plus project (PIs: Dr P. Klimes and Dr M. Leponce)

2018 (2 months)
EuCFACE - WSU, Australia
Field experiments on tri-trophic interactions on ERC project (PI: Dr K. Sam) entitled ‚ÄúWhy is the world green: testing top-down control of plant-herbivore food webs by experiments with birds, bats and ants‚Äù

2017 (2 months)
Virginia, USA
Fellowship at Smithsonian Institution Conservation and Research Center

2016 (6 months)
Binatang research centre, Papua New Guinea
Leading field project focused on arboreal ant ecology



I have developed 4 R packages:

RRatepol
RFossilpol
REcopol
RUtilpol




2021 - 2023
University of Bergen
Open Science Workshop: Reproducibility in science

2021 - 2023
University of Bergen
Practical course on community ecology




POSTDOC INDIVIDUAL FELLOWSHIP - Incoming (GACR)
IBERA grant (Czech Academy of Science)

Hello, I am Ond≈ôej Mottl.
I am ressearcher with the main focus on quantitative ecology, macroecology, palaeoecology, and community ecology with interest in data science.
üî≠ I‚Äôm currently working on developing state-of-the-art tools for to study global biodiversity patterns and lowering the barriers of science exploration.
üí¨ Ask me about R, GitHub, biodiversity, ‚Ä¶
